description: Inflation is no longer your best friend if you plan to sell a property. For years, Indians had the option of reducing tax on profit made from selling a house by making use of what is called 'indexation benefit'. It allowed the difference between purchase and sale price of a house (profit) to be reduced by the inflation rate that prevailed during the time property was owned.
title: Indexation gone. How about selling old house and buying a new one?
Capital pain: Tax hike to eat into your profit
High Court relief for ED officials in Karnataka tribal funds scam
Congress CMs to skip NITI Aayog meet over 'Budget bias'

description: A central assistance of Rs 2.2 lakh crore over the next five years is aimed at meeting the housing requirement of 1 crore urban poor and middle-class families under Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana-Urban. Govt has also proposed an interest subsidy to provide loans at affordable rates. FM Nirmala Sitharaman said 3 crore additional houses under Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY) in rural and urban areas had been announced and for this, the necessary allocations were being made.
title: Roof over head for 1 crore urban poor in next 5 years

description: Individuals miffed at tax collection at source (TCS) proposals have now been offered a small relief - provided they have salary income. At present, a salaried employee may declare income, such as bank interest and rent, to their employer, who factors this and, accordingly, deducts a higher tax against the monthly salary. The employee then does not have to worry about paying advance tax as adequate tax has already been withheld.
title: Budget 2024: How TCS is set to become less TDS for salaried class

description: In another indication that the old tax regime will be eased out, finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman has tried to make the new tax regime more attractive for taxpayers. She has increased the standard deduction for salaried class by Rs 25,000 from Rs 50,000 to Rs 75,000 while keeping it at the same level of Rs 50,000 for the old regime. This means that tax liability across slabs will reduce by Rs 7,500 which, with 4% education cess, will become Rs 7,800.
title: Budget 2024: Out with old, new makes news
UP slaps Gangsters Act on mastermind of various leaks, 22 accomplices
Strongroom was breached, papers photographed hours before NEET: CBI

description: Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge and leader of opposition Rahul Gandhi slammed the budget as a "kursi bachao (save the chair)” effort, while claiming that the Modi govt had borrowed ideas “generously” from the Congress’ manifesto, though it could not do so properly. Rahul Gandhi in a post on X, Gandhi said it was a “Kursi Bachao' budget.” He followed up by adding that “Appease Allies: Hollow promises to them at the cost of other states. Appease Cronies: Benefits to AA with no relief for the common Indian. Copy and Paste: Congress manifesto and previous budgets."
title: Ideas copied from manifesto, Kursi bachao budget: Congress

description: Terming the Union Budget "kursi bachao Budget" and discriminatory against south India, Telangana CM A Revanth Reddy on Tuesday said he would try to unite all southern states to fight against the Modi govt. "We have already written to Karnataka and Tamil Nadu. Right from delimitation of parliamentary constituencies to Central funds, Centre-state relations, how much Centre is giving back to the states for every rupee they pay to the Centre - everything will be discussed," Revanth said.
title: Will unite South against 'discriminatory' Budget: Revanth Reddy

description: Home minister Amit Shah said the Budget not only exemplified Bharat's newfound sense of purpose, hope and optimism under the Prime Minister Narendra Modi-led NDA govt but also fortified them. "Harnessing the power of Bharat's youth, nari shakti and farmers, the Budget fuels the nation's pace on the path of emerging as a developed nation by ushering in a new era of employment and opportunities," Shah said in a post on X .
title: Budget will open path to jobs, opportunities: Amit Shah

description: Does this Budget leave you richer or poorer? The answer depends on your income level, which income tax regime you opt for, and how much and where you have invested.n For anybody with annual income of Rs 10 lakh or more, changes made by the FM in tax slabs under the new regime and the enhanced standard deduction mean a net gain of Rs 17,500 annually. Since a reduction in your tax also means health and education cess goes down, you save another Rs 700 (4% of Rs 17,500) to take the total savings to Rs 18,200.
title: Budget 2024: Are you richer or poorer?

description: Supreme Court on Tuesday rejected pleas for a retest for admissions to 1.08 lakh MBBS seats in govt and private medical colleges in the absence of evidence to establish that the exam paper leak in Hazaribag vitiated the results or breached the examination’s sanctity and integrity, a verdict that lifted the haze of uncertainty that had hung over NEET-UG while also ending the anxiety that had faced those likely to fetch the much-coveted seats in medical colleges across the country.
title: SC: No NEET-UG retest, but 4 lakh candidates to lose 5 marks each

description: The generosity in the Budget for Bihar and Andhra Pradesh has propelled BJP and its allies TDP and JD(U) along what has been a win-win trajectory since they decided to kiss and make up before the Lok Sabha polls, the basket of announcements underscoring the power of the 28 seats that the two parties have in LS.
title: Allies with benefits: Bonanza for Andhra Pradesh, Bihar

description: The effect of 2024's Lok Sabha election results was writ large on the first Budget of Modi 3.0, with employment creation given pride of place and keeping allies happy too very much in focus. The fact that the Budget comes at a time when the govt’s finances are relatively comfortable meant that finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman could afford to address these concerns with targeted schemes while keeping the fiscal deficit under a tight leash relative to recent years.
title: Budget 2024: Formula one; focus now on getting jobs done

description: England vice-captain Ollie Pope is optimistic about the team's potential to score 600 runs in a single Test day. Following a historic performance against the West Indies, where England surpassed 400 runs in both innings, Pope cites previous success, such as scoring 506-4 against Pakistan, as evidence. Under coach Brendon McCullum and captain Ben Stokes, England are shifting from building confidence to becoming more ruthless. Pope notes recent team transitions and emerging talents, emphasizing the team's balanced and confident approach.
title: 600 runs in a day in Tests? England star says...

description: Catch up on today's top entertainment news from Bollywood and beyond. Highlights include Sonakshi Sinha and Zaheer Iqbal celebrating one-month wedding anniversary, Prabhas’ Kalki 2898 AD becoming the highest grossing foreign film in North America, and Radhikka Madan remembering her Angrezi Medium co-star Irrfan Khan. Here are the top five stories making waves today.
title: Top 5 entertainment news of the day

description: A rare astronomical event is scheduled to occur on July 25, when the Moon will traverse the face of Saturn, the sixth planet from the sun and the second largest in our solar system. This phenomenon, known as an occultation, will temporarily obscure the planet from view, providing a unique opportunity for stargazers and astronomers to observe.
title: Moon to 'occult' Saturn: When, where it will be visible in India

description: India's Shafali Verma powered the defending champions to an 82-run victory over Nepal in the Women's Asia Cup T20 with a career-best 48-ball 81. Verma and Dayalan Hemalatha's 122-run opening stand laid the foundation for India's 178-3. Nepal, needing to chase within 10 overs to surpass Pakistan's net run rate, fell short, finishing at 96-9. Deepti Sharma starred with the ball, taking 3-13. India’s dominant performance secured their semifinal spot, joining Pakistan from Group A.
title: Verma stars as India thrash Nepal to qualify for Asia Cup semifinals
MAGA meltdown after smooth Dem transition that hands baton to Kamala
Navy chief reviews damage to INS Brahmaputra
'Kamala is BRAT': How Harris campaign is embracing memes

description: Gautam Gambhir, the newly appointed head coach of the Indian men's cricket team, took charge on Tuesday as the team began their first practice session in Pallekele, in preparation for the upcoming three-match T20I series against Sri Lanka.Gambhir, who has taken over from the esteemed Rahul Dravid, led the team onto the field and supervised the training session, which included fielding exercises and one-on-one interactions with the players.
title: Gambhir gives batting tips to Samson on first day in office
House of Glory podcast: Celebrating the legacy of Olympic hero KD Jadhav

description: Kharge called the 2024-25 budget disappointing, criticizing Sitharaman's presentation for favoring TDP and JD(U). He condemned neglecting Kalyan-Karnataka-Hyderabad and the weak railway budget. He criticized Modi's 10-year tenure, mentioning Modi Ki Guarantee, the mid-day meal, absence of Census data, and May 20, 2024, elections. Subsidies for fertilizers were also missing from the budget.
title: Kharge slams Centre for 'disappointing budget'
'Truth has prevailed': Education minister Pradhan on SC's NEET-UG judgement

description: SummerSlam 2024 boasts an exciting lineup featuring seven intense matches, including championship clashes and a special referee showdown. Mark your calendars for August 3rd to catch all the action live on Peacock. Don't miss the thrill of this year's SummerSlam!
title: WWE SummerSlam 2024 match card, date, timings, how to watch and more

description: US Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle has tendered her resignation coming under fire over the recent assassination attempt of former President Donald Trump, CNN reported. The move came a day after lawmakers grilled her over the agency's handling of Trump's protection at the Pennsylvania rally where a shooter fired at Trump.
title: US Secret Service chief resigns over Trump shooting

description: Elvish Yadav, Bigg Boss OTT 2 winner, faces ED scrutiny in Lucknow for money laundering linked to snake venom. A Noida raid found venom in a plastic container. Charged under wildlife and narcotics laws and delayed due to UK travels, he is on bond. He supported Lovekesh Kataria and clashed with Faisal Shaikh on Bigg Boss OTT 3.
title: YouTuber Elvish Yadav appears before ED in a money laundering case

description: The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has left it up to the International Cricket Council (ICC) to convince the BCCI to send its team to Pakistan for the upcoming champions Trophy, scheduled to be held in the first quarter of next year. According to a PCB source, while the budget for the Champions Trophy was approved at the recent ICC meetings in Colombo, the schedule and format didn't come up for discussion at all.
title: 'It is now up to...': PCB on India visiting Pakistan for CT
Encounter breaks out between forces & terrorists in J&K's Kupwara
'Call security': CJI scolds senior lawyer during NEET-UG hearing

description: The opposition criticizes the Union Budget, presented by Finance Minister Sitharaman, for favoring Andhra Pradesh and Bihar. Rahul Gandhi brands it 'Kursi Bachao Budget,' alleging JD(U) and TDP support. Congress accuses it of copying their manifesto. TMC and Mamata Banerjee criticize the budget, with Priyanka Chaturvedi highlighting special status denial for Maharashtra and inflation concerns.
title: INDIA bloc MPs to protest in Parliament against 'discriminatory' Union Budget
'Numbers don't lie': How first budget of Modi 3.0 reflects changed political reality

description: Newly-appointed skipper Suryakumar Yadav on Tuesday gave a big hint to left-arm spinner Axar Patel ahead of the first T20I against Sri Lanka in Pallekele. The Sri Lanka series marks the beginning of a new chapter for the Indian T20I team under Suryakumar's captaincy. As he steps into this new role, all eyes will be on him to see how he navigates the team through the series and establishes his leadership style.
title: 'Teesre-chauthe over mein...': SKY gives big hint to Axar Patel
After 5 days, big blaze on cargo ship finally doused

description: Amazon Prime Video's India update introduces a new home screen, 'Prime' destination, AI-generated personalised recommendations using Large Language Models, and a refreshed interface with smooth transitions and zoom effects. Ensuring engagement across all devices, Kam Keshmiri, Vice President of Design, emphasizes enhanced user experience for an easy-to-navigate entertainment destination.
title: Amazon announces these new features for Prime Video users in India
Dems rally behind Kamala to seal her nomination after Biden calls in to say "I love you, kid"
SC dismisses pleas seeking NEET-UG 2024 retest: What top court said
CM Stalin to boycott NITI Aayog meet for 'ignoring' TN in Budget

description: Finance minister introduces 3 new schemes to enhance employment through EPFO, with a total outlay of Rs 1.07 lakh crore. Schemes aim to benefit first-time employees, encourage job creation in manufacturing sector, and support employers for additional employment. EPFO records highest net addition of 19.50 lakh members in May 2024, with significant growth in 18-25 age group.
title: How will new schemes via EPFO benefit first-time employees and employers

description: Budget 2024 income tax takeaways: This is the first full budget of the Modi Government post elections. With no major changes being announced in the interim budget, the expectations were high this time around. In line with Government’s focus on simplifying taxes, improving tax-payer services, provide tax certainty and reduce litigation the FM proposed the following changes to the direct-taxes:
title: Budget 2024: What are the top 10 income tax relief, capital gains tax changes?

description: In a latest development, the three-member committee, appointed by the International Cricket Council (ICC), to conduct the review into the delivery of the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2024, is in favour of a thorough forensic audit and is likely to appoint an external company specifically for this purpose. The development comes a day after ICC appointed Roger Twose, Lawson Naidoo and Imran Khwaja to probe the matter and has been reportedly given a free hand to conduct the investigation.
title: ICC board pushes for forensic audit into T20 WC financial fraud
'Not justified ...': SC refuses demand for 2024 NEET-UG retest
HC orders removal of defamatory posts against Anjali Birla within 24 hours
Modi 3.0's Budget boost for allies: Congress calls it 'Kursi Bachao Budget'
'Watch Ambani wedding ...': Ashneer Grover takes dig at Union Budget

description: Nirmala Sitharaman's Budget 2024 raises standard deduction to Rs 75,000 for salaried individuals and pensioners, and Rs 25,000 for family pensioners. This increases tax savings and reduces taxable income. Originally introduced in 1961, reintroduced in 2018, and last increased in 2019, it replaces medical reimbursement and transport allowance. Claim via income tax return.
title: What is the latest standard deduction limit post Budget 2024?

description: The Budget 2024 introduces significant changes to NPS benefits, allowing for higher employer contributions and tax savings. The new tax regime impacts both private and public sector employees. Learn more about the details and implications of these changes.
title: Budget 2024 has good news for NPS tax savings
'Directionless and disappointing': Farm leaders slam Union Budget
No big bang for defence: Meagre hike in allocation despite China-Pak threat
'Either special status or ... ': What Bihar CM Nitish said on budget boost

description: Budget 2024 income tax changes explained: Salaried individuals at what income level will benefit the most from the income tax slab and standard deduction changes under the new income tax regime? How does this math work? We take a look:
title: Explained: How will you save Rs 17,500 tax post Budget?
Union Budget: 10 big-ticket announcements made by FM Sitharaman

description: Team India begins their tour of Sri Lanka with new leadership under Suryakumar Yadav and vice-captain Shubman Gill. The Indian cricketers headed for their first practice session of the Sri Lanka series on Tuesday under the watchful eyes of Gautam Gambhir who succeeded Rahul Dravid as the head coach. The Indian cricket team will play 3 T20Is and 3 ODIs against Sri Lanka, starting on July 27 and ending on August 7.
title: Watch: Gambhir holds first practice session as India coach

description: In the first budget of Modi govt 3.0, finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman unveiled a $24 billion package with measures aimed at employment generation, skilling programs for youth and women, and a new tax regime for lower-income earners. The budget gave special attention to states represented by Modi’s key allies, such as Andhra Pradesh and Bihar.
title: Winners and losers from Modi govt's first budget after Lok Sabha elections
Budget 2024: Big tax shake-up for property sellers, buyers

description: The previous Olympic Games, originally slated for 2020 in Tokyo, were delayed by a year due to the global pandemic and were ultimately conducted with minimal spectator presence.
title: First COVID case at Paris Olympics: Aus player isolated

description: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman's budget speeches have varied in duration over the years, with her latest one for the fiscal year 2024-25 lasting 1 hour and 25 minutes. Her speeches reflect changes in India's economic priorities and practices, highlighting her significant role in shaping the country's fiscal policies.
title: Budget 2024-25: From longest to shortest speeches in India's budget history

description: Anjali Birla, who is an IRPS officer and the daughter of Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla, has filed a defamation suit in the Delhi High Court. She seeks the removal of social media posts that falsely allege she passed UPSC exams on her first attempt due to her father's influence.
title: Om Birla's daughter moves HC against posts on dad's influence

description: Latest income tax slabs FY 2024-25: What are the latest income tax slabs for FY 2024-25 post the Union Budget 2024 speech by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman? What are the tax slabs and tax rates under the new income tax regime and the old income tax regime? Find out:
title: Budget 2024: What are the new income tax slabs?
Gold prices to come down as custom duty on gold, silver slashed to 6%
'Kursi bachao budget': Oppn attacks govt over Andhra, Bihar bonanza

description: Finance Minister reduces defence budget significantly, focusing on job creation and domestic manufacturing. India aims to boost indigenisation and reduce reliance on imports in the defence sector.
title: Defence Budget 2024: Govt reduces allocation to Rs 4.54 lakh crore
Budget: 3L crore announced for women, what do the benefits include?
From real estate to rickshaw: Mumbai driver's tips for personal growth
Union Budget 2024: What's cheaper & what's dearer? Here's full list
'Glad to know': Chidambaram says Modi govt's budget 'copied' from Congress manifesto
Union Budget 2024: FM Nirmala Sitharaman's full speech text

description: As per usual dominance at the Summer Olympics, USA is expected to win the most medals, but China may surpass them in terms of winning the most gold medals -- say predictions by Nielsen’s Gracenote Sports, which supplies statistical analysis for sports leagues around the world. It also tracks major competitions involving Olympic sports leading up to the Games
title: Paris Olympics medals tally prediction: India not in top 30

description: Union finance minister announced Rs 15,000 crore for Amaravati in the 2024-25 budget. TDP's Chandrababu Naidu met Amit Shah on July 17 for budget aid, discussed Polavaram with Prime Minister Modi. Two TDP Union ministers met Jal Shakti minister C R Patil. Andhra Pradesh water resources minister N Ramanaidu emphasized Polavaram's importance. JD(U) in Bihar also seeks special status.
title: Union budget: Nirmala Sitharaman announces Rs 15,000 crore for new Andhra Pradesh capital Amaravati

description: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman presented the Union Budget 2024-25 in the Lok Sabha, New Delhi, allocating Rs 1.48 lakh crore for education, employment, and skilling. Emphasizing MSMEs and the middle class, it extends PM Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana for five years, benefiting 80 crore.
title: Education budget 2024: Government allocates Rs 1.48 Lakh Crore for education, employment, and skilling
Union Budget 2024: What Chandrababu Naidu's Andhra Pradesh got
Budget 2024: FM Sitharaman announces Rs 26,000 crore bonanza for Bihar
Over 4 lakh NEET-UG students to lose marks after IIT panel reports on disputed Physics question

description: Satwik and his men's doubles badminton partner Chirag Shetty are considered one of the strongest contenders for a medal in their category. The popular duo, also known as 'Sat-Chi', have had a successful year so far, winning two Badminton World Federation Tour titles -- the French Open title in March 2024 and the Thailand Open 2024 in May 2024.
title: Paris Oly: Satwik strikes 'gold', meets Nadal - see pic

description: Riteish Deshmukh, known for Ek Villain, succeeds Mahesh Manjrekar as Bigg Boss Marathi host. Despite comparisons to Salman Khan and Mahesh's iconic styles, Riteish remains unbothered. Eager and excited about the responsibility, he looks forward to engaging with contestants and viewers, valuing the beloved Bigg Boss format.
title: Excl: BB Marathi host Riteish: No one can host BB like Salman Bhau

description: HCLTech CEO C.Vijayakumar emerges as the top-paid Indian CEO with a substantial remuneration increase. The annual report reveals detailed breakdown of his salary, including base pay, bonuses, and incentives. Moreover, Vijayakumar discusses company performance and the evolving workplace model in a shareholder letter.
title: Indian IT industry has a 'new' highest-paid CEO: Here’s how much he earns
Sitharaman opts for white and magenta saree for Budget 2024 presentation

description: The rumour industry had been working overtime ever since it was announced that former opener Gautam Gambhir will be the head coach for India. His firebrand altercations with batting talisman Virat Kohli in the IPL (2013 KKR vs RCB) and 2023 (LSG vs RCB) were probably the reasons for that.
title: 'The right to fight...': How Gambhir justified his run-ins with Kohli
Hindu temple in Canada defaced with anti-India graffiti

description: Bodycam footage released by Illinois police shows the fatal shooting of Sonya Massey by a sheriff's deputy. The officer has been charged with murder and official misconduct, pleading not guilty. President Biden expresses condolences, while protests demand justice. The incident highlights ongoing issues of police violence and the need for reform.
title: Watch: Woman calls 911 to report suspected intruder, 'shot in face' by Illinois police

description: India defeated South Africa by seven runs in a thrilling last-over finish to the T20 World Cup final in Bridgetown, Barbados, on June 29 to win their second title in the tournament since winning the inaugural edition in 2007. It was also India's first ICC title win in 11 years, since emerging victorious at the ICC Champions Trophy in 2013.
title: 'I saw him hug the Cup and cry': Ashwin' faovurite T20 WC moment

description: The health ministry in Hamas-run Gaza said Monday that an Israeli operation in the main southern city of Khan Yunis killed 70 people and wounded more than 200, after Israel warned its forces would "forcefully operate" in the area. "Due to the Israeli occupation's attacks and massacres in Khan Yunis governorate from the early hours of this morning until now, 70 people have been martyred and more than 200 wounded," the Gaza health ministry said.
title: Israeli operation in Gaza's Khan Yunis kills 70
'My son was killed by woke mind virus': Elon Musk

description: Budget 2024: There are expectations for the government to adhere to the fiscal consolidation path, aiming to reduce the fiscal deficit to 4.5% of GDP by 2025-26. Here are the key numbers to watch out for the first full Budget of Modi 3.0:
title: Budget: Top 8 numbers from Sitharaman's speech you shouldn't miss watching out for

description: Reportedly, the ICC has incurred losses over $20m for conducting matches in New York, Florida and Dallas. Apparently, the tournament's expenses for the US leg overshot the allocated budget by a long margin, something that was pointed out by Pankaj Khimji of Oman.
title: ICC forms three-member panel to review conduct of T20 World Cup
Sitharaman to make history by surpassing Morarji Desai's Budget presentation record
Muharram violence: Bareilly admin razes 11 houses, jails 35

description: Harris made history as the first Black woman and the first woman of Indian descent on a major US presidential ticket, leading to speculation in Indian media about strengthened U.S.-India relations under a Biden-Harris administration. While bilateral ties have improved, Harris has not focused personally on India, instead prioritizing domestic issues like reproductive rights and border security.
title: Why there is muted response in India over Kamala Harris

description: Spotify's promotion offers three months of Premium for Rs 59 to first-time individual users, ending August 25, 2024. Post-trial, it's Rs 119/month, cancellable anytime. To subscribe: log in, upgrade to 'Get Premium Individual,' and enter payment (UPI, card). Benefits: ad-free, offline, high-quality music, any order play, real-time listening, queue organization, insights. Details on Spotify webpage.
title: Here's your chance to buy three-month Spotify Premium for Rs 59

description: Surya J, the estranged wife of IAS officer Ranjeeth Kumar J, ingested poison near Kumar’s house in Sector 19. Her note to Tamil Nadu CM M K Stalin reveals Rs 1.35 crore repayment, debt trap, and her involvement with Maharaja and Senthil Kumar in a failed Rs 2 crore ransom plot.
title: In suicide note, IAS officer’s wife says was framed in a case

description: Shoaib Bashir delivered his best Test figures as England defeated the West Indies by 241 runs to secure a series win. The 20-year-old off-spinner claimed 5-41—his third five-wicket haul in just five Tests, and his first in England. The West Indies, set a target of 385, collapsed to 143 all out. England now lead the three-match series 2-0, following their innings and 114-run victory at Lord's. The third Test at Edgbaston begins on Friday.
title: When a 'Unicorn Balloon' interrupted ENG vs WI match

description: Karnataka Cabinet, led by Chief Minister Siddaramaiah, approved resolutions against NEET, 'One Nation, One Election', and delimitation. They cleared the 'Greater Bengaluru Governance Bill 2024'. A committee led by B S Patil restructured Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike, suggesting up to 400 wards.
title: Karnataka okays resolutions against NEET, 'One Nation, One Election'
Punjab man gets 70-year jail for murder of wife & 2 relatives

description: Rahul Dravid is in talks to potentially return as head coach for Rajasthan Royals. Uncertainty looms over Kumar Sangakkara's role. The 51-year-old has had a long relationship with RR, having been their captain who led them to the Champions League T20 final and IPL playoffs in 2013, before taking on the mentor's role in 2014 and 2015, when they finished third in the IPL.
title: IPL: Rahul Dravid may return to Rajasthan Royals as head coach

description: Railway Budget 2024 Live: FM Nirmala Sitharaman is expected to announce that in this financial year the Vande Bharat sleeper train for long distance overnight travel and Vande Metro for short-distance travel will be rolled out.
title: Railway Budget 2024: New Vande Bharat sleeper, Amrit Bharat trains likely
Karnataka freezes Bill on techies' workhours
WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange reappears in smiling beachside family photo

description: Delta Air Lines is still grappling with a tech outage, leading to thousands of flight cancellations. The slow recovery process contrasts with other airlines nearing normal operations. Transportation Secretary in contact with Delta over complaints. Passengers facing delays and uncertainties. Delta's systems heavily impacted by the outage.
title: All but one airline still recovering from CrowdStrike tech outage
Supriya Sule accuses Sansad TV of 'censoring' non-Hindi speeches

description: CM Punk and Drew McIntyre will go head-to-head at SummerSlam with Seth Rollins as the Special Guest Referee. The match promises to be intense as all three superstars look to settle their differences in the ring.
title: CM Punk vs McIntyre special guest referee match announced for SummerSlam

description: Sourav Ganguly, fondly known as "Dada," is celebrated as one of India's most influential cricket captains. Leading the Indian team from 2000 to 2005, Ganguly transformed Indian cricket with his aggressive leadership style and fearless attitude. Under Ganguly's captaincy, India achieved remarkable success, including reaching the 2003 World Cup final and winning the NatWest Trophy in 2002. Ganguly's tenure was marked by the nurturing of young talents like Virender Sehwag and Yuvraj Singh, and a renewed emphasis on teamwork and resilience.
title: Pak journalist compares Ganguly to Imam, faces backlash
Bengaluru cops file FIR against 2 ED officials for ‘bid to frame CM’
J&K: Another infiltration bid foiled by security forces, one Army jawan injured

description: US Vice President Kamala Harris started her campaign with an attack on Donald Trump and a vow to win in November, following President Joe Biden's unexpected withdrawal. Harris, now the frontrunner for the Democratic nomination, emphasised her prosecutorial experience and commitment to key issues like abortion, while Biden endorsed her and praised her leadership.
title: 'I know his type': Kamala calls Trump a 'predator and cheater,' vows victory
India must labour to generate 78.5 lakh non-farm jobs every year
